title: Episode 18: Black Eyed Kids
description:
Children are supposed to be innocent and sweet, however these children aren't like most. Solid black eyes, pale skin, telekinetic abilities. Maybe they aren't really children at all. We discuss the history of black eyed children, terrifying encounters, possible explanations as to what these paranormal creatures really are, and the science behind vampire sex!

itunes:author: Cloud10 and iHeartPodcasts
itunes:subtitle: There's a knock at your door.  You answer it and find two young children standing on your doorstep.  Immediately you have an overwhelming sense of fear though you can't explain why.  That is until you see their eyes...  Whatever you do, don't let them in.
